amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to reduce the salary of Melissa Schwartz, Director of Communications of the Department of the Interior, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 134 - 272, 1 Present (Roll no. 382).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 134 - 272, 1 Present (Roll no. 382).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
